summary: Jack and Julie live in a bare flat in Paris. At night, Jack drives a taxi while Julie wanders around the city, and in the day they make love. One day Julie meets Joseph, the daytime driver ... See full summary »
cast: Guilaine Londez|Thomas Langmann|François Négret|Nicole Colchat|Pierre Laroche|Christian Crahay|Luc Fonteyn|Sandrine Laroche|Yves Coméliau|Olindo Bolzan|Nicole Duret|Violette Léonard|Cecilia Kankonda
title: Noche y día
